name: Super Fox (mbolt)
description: This is a game am working on. Its my first game that am releasing and its bases on random asset, Majority came from heartbeast on youtube for now. This is a really early build for linux, Windows will be added soon. Might be full of errors. The story is about a fox with no memories on the warrior's path. Will he be a savior or a conqueror, only time will tell.
